name: Body Change
description:
Body Change is a game where you change the player to move the other one.

The black body is used to trigger objects/boxes, while the white body is used to go through doors.

How to play:

Keys:
  • F to change body
  • W,A,S,D to move
  • M to enable the menu
Objective:
  • Use trigger objects to unlock doors
Triggers:
  • Boxes are used to either stay on them, or touch them. Depends on level, if there are multiple boxes, they need to be just touched, if there is a single one, it needs to be stayed on.
Doors:
  • Simply go through them, and boom! If they didn't work, they aren't unlocked.
Note: this game is alike a prototype, and it's no-where completed or even at it's best, there are 2 single levels testing the mechanic.
